source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a computer-generated scenery shot of a black-and-white model of a suburban neighborhood. The camera flies over the sprawling layout of houses and streets. It then zooms in to highlight a single, more detailed house, which is identified by the text "ROBERT KARDASHIAN'S HOUSE" at the bottom of the screen.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding mountain road, moving in a single file as the camera follows them from behind. The camera gradually shifts to a side angle, capturing the cyclists as they accelerate around a sharp bend. One cyclist briefly pulls ahead before the group regains formation and continues up the incline.
